item.description:
My goodness what a summer!!  Velvet and I have missed you all terribly.  I know everyone's been busy so I wanted to go ahead and get us going again on our meet ups.  We'll have our next meet up on Sunday, September 16th from 11am to 1pm.

For those who have not attended before, please be sure to bring proof of updated vaccines for rabies, distemper and canine cough.

Any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

We're looking forward to seeing you all again!!!

Agni
item.name: September Meet Up
